title: Smart AgroHub
main.subtitle: Monitor and manage your smart farm efficiently
about.title: About AgroHub AI
about.desc1: AgroHub AI delivers advanced agricultural insights powered by AI and sensor fusion. Our platform enables farmers to monitor plant and livestock health in real-time, predict potential issues, and optimize yield.
about.unique_val: Integrates multiple sensor data streams with AI for unmatched precision.
about.benefits_val: Reduces crop losses, improves livestock welfare, and maximizes productivity.
actions.title: Actions
